name: 蔣欣翰
objective:
先修課程：4403053 或負責教授同意
本徵值與本徵函數，向量分析，向量微積分，傅立葉級數與邊界值問題，偏微分方程，複變函數。
Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.
schedule:
Week 1: Overview; Systems of Linear Equations
Week 2-3: Row Reduction and Echelon Forms; Vector and Matrix Equations
Week 4: Solution Sets of Linear Systems
Week 5-6: Linear Independence and Transformations
Week 7: Matrix Operations; Inverse of a Matrix
Week 8: Characteristics of Invertible Matrices
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Determinants
Week 11: Vector Spaces and Subspace; Null Space; Column Space
Week 12: Linearly Independent Sets; Bases
Week 13: Eigenvectors and Eigenvalues; The Characteristic Equation
Week 14: Diagonalization
Week 15: Orthogonal Sets; Orthogonal Projections
Week 16: Fourier Series/Fourier Transform
Week 17: Partial Differential Equations
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Grading -
Homework 15%
Quiz 15%
Midterm 30%
Final 30%
Attendance 10%

Policy on Copying - 
Copying is not acceptable. Do your own work.
materials:
Textbook - 
David C. Lay et al., Linear Algebra and its Applications, 6th Edition, Pearson, 2021.
